amendment.description: To strike the rescission of funds appropriated for Global Health programs, including family planning and reproductive health.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2878 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 402.

action.text: Amendment SA 2878 proposed by Senator Rosen to Amendment SA 2853.
